TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDependency extends System.Object

summary.span: 对象表示应用程序和 SQL Server 实例间的查询通知依赖关系。

span.span: The object represents a query notification dependency between an application and an instance of SQL Server.

summary.span: 应用程序可以创建一个 对象并进行注册以通过 事件处理程序接收通知。

span.span: An application can create a object and register to receive notifications via the event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非常适合于缓存的方案，其中您的 ASP.NET 应用程序或中间层服务需要在内存中保留某些缓存的信息。 is ideal for caching scenarios, where your ASP.NET application or middle-tier service needs to keep certain information cached in memory. 可以在数据库中的原始数据更改，以便可以刷新缓存时接收通知。 allows you to receive notifications when the original data in the database changes so that the cache can be refreshed. 若要设置依赖关系，您需要将相关联对象与一个或多个对象。To set up a dependency, you need to associate a object to one or more objects. 若要接收通知，你需要订阅事件。To receive notifications, you need to subscribe to the event. 有关用于创建查询通知要求的详细信息，请参阅[使用查询通知](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/working-with-query-notifications)。For more information about the requirements for creating queries for notifications, see [Working with Query Notifications](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/working-with-query-notifications). > [!NOTE] > 用于在 ASP.NET 或中间层服务而设计的相对较少的服务器时针对该数据库处于活动状态的依赖项。 was designed to be used in ASP.NET or middle-tier services where there is a relatively small number of servers having dependencies active against the database. 它没有设计为在客户端应用程序，会有数百或数千个客户端计算机中使用为单个数据库服务器设置的对象。It was not designed for use in client applications, where hundreds or thousands of client computers would have objects set up for a single database server. 如果你正在开发一个应用程序数据发生更改时需要可靠的次秒级通知，查看各节[规划高效的查询通知策略](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#planning-an-efficient-query-notifications-strategy)和[查询的替代方法通知](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#alternatives-to-query-notifications)中[制定通知计划](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v%3dsql.105))一文。If you are developing an application where you need reliable sub-second notifications when data changes, review the sections [Planning an Efficient Query Notifications Strategy](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#planning-an-efficient-query-notifications-strategy) and [Alternatives to Query Notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#alternatives-to-query-notifications) in the [Planning for Notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v%3dsql.105)) article. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 中的查询通知](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md)并[构建通知解决方案](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2005/ms171065(v%3dsql.90))。For more information, see [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md) and [Building Notification Solutions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2005/ms171065(v%3dsql.90)). > [!NOTE] > 可能与启动命令执行的线程不同的线程上生成事件。The event may be generated on a different thread from the thread that initiated command execution. 仅对满足一系列特定需求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.

span.span: Using Query Notifications

summary.span: 用默认设置创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化对象使用默认 Service Broker 服务名和超时。在构造之后的某个位置，必须使用方法对此的一个或多个命令相关联对象。The constructor initializes the object using the default Service Broker service name and time-out. At some point after construction, you must use the method to associate one or more commands to this object. 仅对满足一系列特定需求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker)并[使用查询通知](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications)。For more information, see [SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker) and [Working with Query Notifications](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与依赖项关联的结果集之一是否已经更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether one of the result sets associated with the dependency has changed.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示结果集之一是否已经更改。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether one of the result sets has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不使用事件，可以检查属性以确定是否已更改查询结果。If you are not using the event, you can check the property to determine if the query results have changed. 属性不一定意味着数据中的更改。The property does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情况下，例如超时过期，若要设置通知请求的失败也会生成更改事件。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate a change event.

summary.span: 当收到与此 对象关联的任意命令的通知时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a notification is received for any of the commands associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联的命令的结果更改时发生。 occurs when the results for the associated command change. 如果不使用，可以检查属性以确定是否已更改查询结果。If you are not using , you can check the property to determine whether the query results have changed. 事件不一定意味着数据中的更改。The event does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情况下，如超时已过期，并且未能设置通知请求，还生成。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate .

span.span: Using Query Notifications
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中 SQL Server 连接发生错误时，将重新启动侦听器。The listener will restart when an error occurs in the SQL Server connection. 多次调用方法可以进行，有以下限制：Multiple calls to the method can be made, subject to the following restrictions: - 使用相同的参数 （相同的连接字符串和调用的线程中的 Windows 凭据） 的多个调用都有效。Multiple calls with identical parameters (the same connection string and Windows credentials in the calling thread) are valid. - 多个调用使用不同的连接字符串是有效的只要：Multiple calls with different connection strings are valid as long as: - 每个连接字符串指定不同的数据库，或Each connection string specifies a different database, or - 每个连接字符串指定不同的用户，或Each connection string specifies a different user, or - 该调用来自不同应用程序域。The calls come from different application domains. 可以使都正确可以为使用多个线程来表示不同的用户凭据，而无需因为不同的用户可以订阅和侦听到的组授予 dbo 角色的应用程序 (使用或)到由管理员创建的通知队列。You can make the work correctly for applications that use multiple threads to represent different user credentials without giving the dbo role to the group, because different users can subscribe and listen (using or ) to a notification queue created by an administrator. 相关的应用程序域在启动时，调用具有初始化服务/队列 （CREATE QUEUE 和创建服务数据库访问权限） 的权限的用户 (Windows) 凭据启动。When the relevant application domain starts, call Start with the (Windows) credentials of a user that has permission to initialize a service/queue (the CREATE QUEUE and CREATE SERVICE permissions for the database). 请确保每个 AppDomain，否则二义性会引发的异常后仅调用 Start。Ensure that Start is only called once per AppDomain, otherwise an ambiguity exception is raised. 在用户线程必须有权订阅通知 （数据库的 SUBSCRIBE QUERY NOTIFICATIONS 权限）。The user thread must have permission to subscribe to the notification (the SUBSCRIBE QUERY NOTIFICATIONS permission for the database). 将关联到服务/队列由管理员创建的非管理员用户的订阅请求。 will associate the subscription request of a non-administrator user to the service/queue created by the administrator.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器，该通知来自由连接字符串指定的 SQL Server 实例。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string.

returns.span: 如果侦听器初始化成功，则为 ；如果已存在兼容的侦听器，则为 。

span.span: if the listener initialized successfully; if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启动的侦听器用于接收从通过指定的 SQL Server 实例的依赖关系通知`connectionString`参数。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 调用此方法可能会超过一次使用不同的连接字符串的多个服务器。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 有关其他备注，请参阅。For additional remarks, see .

span.span: The parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.

exception.span: 此方法是从 CLR 内部调用的。

span.span: The method was called from within the CLR.

exception.span: 调用方没有所必需的 代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 随后调用了该方法，调用使用等效的 参数和不同的用户，或者不是同一架构的默认用户的用户。

span.span: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent parameter with a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.

exception.span: 还有所有基础 SqlClient 异常。

span.span: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.

param.span: 如果为 ，则使用默认队列。

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器，该侦听器使用指定的 SQL Server Service Broker 队列从由连接字符串指定的 SQL Server 实例接收。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string using the specified SQL Server Service Broker queue.

returns.span: 如果侦听器初始化成功，则为 ；如果已存在兼容的侦听器，则为 。

span.span: if the listener initialized successfully; if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启动的侦听器用于接收从通过指定的 SQL Server 实例的依赖关系通知`connectionString`参数。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 调用此方法可能会超过一次使用不同的连接字符串的多个服务器。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 如果指定没有队列名称，则用于整个进程，进程服务器中创建临时队列和服务，即使过程涉及多个。If no queue name is specified, creates a temporary queue and service in the server that is used for the entire process, even if the process involves more than one . 在应用程序关闭后会自动删除的队列和服务。The queue and service are automatically removed upon application shutdown. 有关其他备注，请参阅。For additional remarks, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须为每个调用方法调用。The method must be called for each call. 给定的侦听器只能关闭完全在接收相同数量的请求作为请求。A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of requests as requests.

returns.span: 如果侦听器完全停止，则为 ；如果 从侦听器解除绑定，但至少还有另一个 使用同一侦听器，则为 。

span.span: if the listener was completely stopped; if the was unbound from the listener, but there is at least one other using the same listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须为每个调用方法调用。The method must be called for each call. 给定的侦听器只能关闭完全在接收相同数量的请求作为请求。A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of requests as requests.

exception.span: 参数为 NULL。

span.span: The parameter is NULL.

exception.span: 此方法是从 SQLCLR 内部调用的。

span.span: The method was called from within SQLCLR.

exception.span: 调用方没有所必需的 代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 发生基础 SqlClient 异常。

span.span: And underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
